name.namePart: Assisted by Mrs. Wheeler at LSU, Baton Rouge, LA.

mods.abstract: The composition depicts a familiar New Orleans subject matter, that of the traditional visits made to her cemeteries by individuals laden with floral arrangements, on "All Saints' Day" - -November 1st. The setting in this work is the interior of a New Orleans streetcar filled with people carrying bouquets to the cemeteries.
mods.note: the drawing made on architects' tracing cloth, displays the finely /www.lwoventech.c linen texturing in its tonal areas. The drawing was done using dry brush and ink, and pen and ink. The ink itself was a radioactive solution made by the artist.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
